item.title: Using Amazon S3 for your static site? One thing to keep in mind
item.description: Amazon is a great service for hosting your static website. The way it works is by creating a S3 bucket with the name of your website, uploading your files to the bucket and changing the permissions so that the bucket can be read by the internet. item.title: Dashing Dashboard
item.description: (Note: Not my dashboard above) Not long ago I set up a dashboard for our office to show statistics about sales and such. The software we decided to use was Dashing.io. Dashing is a Sinatra based framework written in ruby that lets you build beautiful dashboards. I had no previous experience with ruby but it went well, as it was mostly syntax that differed from what I was used to.
